account_verification.subject: Verify Your Email Account
body: Someone has created a account with this email address. If this was you,
click the link below to verify your email address
This link will expire within $validTime minutes.
If you didn't create this account, just ignore this message.

email_update_verification.subject: Verify Your Email Account
body: Please click on the following link to confirm your email address
and complete updating your email address
This link will expire within $validTime minutes.

password_reset.subject: Password Reset Request
body: Someone has initiated a password reset request for the account associated with this email address.
If this was you, click the link below to verify it was you.
This link will expire within $validTime minutes.
If you didn't request a password reset, just ignore this message.
